description:
WHO ARE OUR CUSTOMERS: We specialize in working with clients in the B2B technology (products, services and solution) and healthcare industries.
WHAT VALUE DO WE BRING?: We use a unique mix of Inbound Marketing and Account Based Marketing techniques to deliver leads that are at the buying stage or the evaluation phase. We do this by using a 360 degree approach to identifying buyer personas and delivering SEO, Content and Social Campaigns combined with targeted outbound campaigns and social selling aimed at specific prospects in target industries. 
We've generated over $120Mil in combined opportunities and an average increase of 4000% traffic every quarter.
